wikipedia_page.main: Albert Edward Thomas (born 7 June 1893 in Ruthin, Denbighshire) was a Welsh cricketer who played for Northamptonshire (Northants) from 1919 to 1933 and Wales in 1927. Thomas was a righthanded batsman and bowled right arm fast-medium pace. He took a career total of 817 wickets for Northants making him the club's fifth highest wicket taker. He died on 21 March 1965 in Kidderminster.
